Title: Directs the office of children and family services to develop a list of eligible substitute day care staff
Summary: Directs the office of children and family services to develop and post a list of eligible substitute day care staff who can be used by a child day care provider in a time of need.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to directing the office of children and family services to develop a list of eligible substitute day care staff
